import java.util.Scanner;

public class Main {

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Scanner input = new Scanner(System.in);
        int T = input.nextInt();
        for (int t=0; t<T; t++) {
            int n = input.nextInt();
            int m = input.nextInt();
            if (n < m) {
                int temp = m;
                m = n;
                n = temp;
            }
            boolean bob = false;
            if ((n == 2 && m == 2)
                    || (n == 4 && m == 4)
                    || (n == 6 && m == 4)
                    || (n == 10 && m == 10)
                    || (n == 12 && m == 8)) {
                bob = true;
            }
            System.out.println(bob ? "Bob" : "Alice");
        }
    }

}
